section.p: Takakura weakens fast and before dawn he is dead. ‘He was never strong, even as a child,’ says Shirakawa, his father, before turning and sweeping out of the room.

Later a courtier comes to inform you that Shirakawa is making changes. You are no longer welcome at the palace. Lose the title
Senior Court Rank
